data.title: Not feeling welcome
data.text: I have entered this tea shop several times now and never felt welcome (my wallet felt welcome). There's something about the way the staff is standing there (a whole family?). It just feels like they one day thought, "Hey we can do the same as Teavana and get rich fast!" They only sell their tea in tins, since I am an avid tea consumer, I already have a vast collection of tins, besides the fact that an old-fashioned paper bag is much more environmentally friendly; they said that the tin was free, so who's paying for that tin? That tin would end up in the recycle or trash, I just want some tea in a bag please, is that too much to ask for? They refused my request, and all stared at me like I was a nasty customer, so I left. There's another cute tea shop in Frederick, with knowledgeable, sweet people. I'd like my tea without an attitude. PS: this is the first time I gave a one star rating...

data.title: Best tea in town! Better than Teavana.
data.text: If you love tea, you will love the offerings at Voila! The variety of Chai's are my favorite.  Great, friendly service. I prefer these teas over Teavana's.

data.title: Worth a trip to Frederick just to shop at Voila
data.text: Voila is a tea shop with an outstanding array of choices and a very helpful and knowledgeable staff to guide your choices.

data.title: The only place I order tea online!
data.text: Discovered this place simply by accident, and it has become my "go to" for tea ordered online.  Friendly staff, knowledgeable about tea and how to prepare and drink it.  They have made several recommendations, and always seem to have several sampling pots available.  I live far away, but order my tea from here.

data.title: Something for everyone
data.text: Huge selection....largest I've ever seen in one place.  Friendly and attentive staff.  Samples available to smell and taste.  A bit cramped if it's crowded.  The Hot & Spicy tasted a bit like an Atomic Fireball...had to get some.

data.title: Tea Time
data.text: Great tea shop. Very knowledgeable and helpful staff. I was overwhelmed at first, but once I dove in, I was in heaven

data.title: Best selection of Tea
data.text: If you are a Tea taster then Voila is not to be missed. The selection of teas are incredible. If they don't have it it probably is not worth trying! Staff is very friendly, selection is great and they are pretty quick to fill your order without rushing you.
